attributes.action: Housing Application-Open Policy, Put an end to it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put an end to your open policy which at the moment is allowing people from other countries to present themselves as homeless at any council housing office and jump the que, thus knocking the local people on the list further down the list.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
